## Problem
A clear description of the problem this feature would solve.
Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution
A clear description of what you'd like to happen.

## Alternatives Considered
Other solutions you've considered, and why they're less ideal.

## Additional Context
Any mockups, diagrams, or references that help illustrate the feature.

## Impact
Which pipeline stage(s) would this affect?
- [ ] Ingest (chunker, embedder, indexer)
- [ ] Claim IR (compiler, normalizer)
- [ ] Retrieve (hybrid, span extraction)
- [ ] Verify (NLI, calibration)
- [ ] Render (policy, certificates)
- [ ] CLI / Configuration

- [ ] Evaluation framework
- [ ] Documentation
